data.name: Bloody Hell
data.detailed_description:
Bloody Hell is a Bullet-Hell Metroidvania about using the blood of demons to your advantage.

For millions of years angels and demons have been at war. Now after all this time it is clear that the demons are winning!
You are the last Arch Angel who has a chance to end it all. But what power do these demons possess, and why have they gained the advantage?

Use demons blood for abilties and during combat. But will you be able to stay sane? Or will you start to follow The Demon King.

GAME FEATURES

  • Dive and Teleport in pools of blood to dodge and kill demons to reach new areas!
  • Weapon upgrade system with loads of possible combinations!
  • Over 25 enemies all with unique attacks!
  • 3 epic demon bosses!
  • Over 2 hours of gameplay!
  • Explore the demonic bathhouse and castle with over 60 rooms!
  • Unveil the truth of Heaven and Hell!
  • Bonus Endless Roguelike mode!

data.short_description: Bloody Hell is a Bullet-Hell Metroidvania about using the blood of demons to your advantage. Fight Epic Bosses, and take revenge on the terrorising demons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
